main_definition: Feeling or expressing thanks; appreciative of kindness.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Feeling thankful for something received or experienced.
meanings_and_examples.example: I am grateful for the help my friend gave me during a difficult time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Recognizing and valuing kindness from others, expressing appreciation for it.
meanings_and_examples.example: She was grateful to her parents for always supporting her dreams.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Showing acknowledgment of the benefits one has received in life or circumstances beyond their control.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite losing his job, he remained grateful for a supportive family and good health.
